description: Ramanujan-Atkin Partition Congruence theorem. For every integer k, p(k*b(n) + a(n)) = 0 (mod c(n)).
comments: For each n, a(n) is a term of this sequence, b(n) and c(n) are the corresponding term of A036490 and A036491 and p is the partition function.
references: G. E. Andrews, The Theory of Partitions, Addison-Wesley, 1976, pp. 159-161.
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
